original_text: All the families of the Shuhamites, according to those that were numbered of them, were threescore and four thousand and four hundred.
korean_text: 수함 모든 종족의 계수된 자가 육만 사천사백 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: All the families of the Shuhamites
according to those that were numbered of them
were threescore and four thousand and four hundred
